stem: Which muscle is innervated by the tibial portion of the sciatic nerve?
rationale_correct: The hamstring (ischial) part of adductor magnus is supplied by the tibial division.

rationale_distractors.B: Short head of biceps femoris is common fibular division.
rationale_distractors.D: Tibialis anterior is deep fibular nerve.
rationale_distractors.E: Fibularis longus is superficial fibular nerve.
